name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ACCOUNT`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDBY`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`,
t1.`BEGIN`,
t1.`CLOSEDBY`,
t1.`CLOSEDDATE`,
t1.`CONFIG`,
t1.`CYCLE`,
t1.`DATE`,
(case when t1.`DATE` = '2030-01-01' then '待定' else t1.`DATE` end) AS `DATE1`,
t1.`END`,
t1.`FINISHEDBY`,
t1.`FINISHEDDATE`,
t1.`TODOSN`,
t1.`id`,
t1.`IDVALUE`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`PRI`,
t1.`PRIVATE`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`TYPE`
FROM `zt_todo` t1
